message.body: A crazy secret, huh? And the lack of criminal activity is due to a couple of different things. 1) Two words: language. barrier. 2) no time... Yet.
Hmmm. Yes. Sleep, plot, and bide your time my pretty
Whoa whoa whoa. What? What are you talking about?
Oh ash.... I’m insane. I’m actually certifiably insane. But- UGHhhhh. okay. i’m going to forward you the text i sent sheridan.
Bien
so it’s a novel, but...
That's fine
Holy. Fucking. Shit.
i know dude.
That's huge. I never saw it (you and your wall are very good), but it's starting to make sense. Wow. That's so intense.
How do you feel? Are you okay?

I was a lot worse... Sheridan's been very kind and let me fall apart over the phone for hours and then piece me back together. And I'm beginning to accept that life is taking me in a completely different direction.
What do you mean?
Like I'm so career driven... It wouldn't work between us, you know?
Yeah, that might be true. What did Sheridan have to say about that?

She says life will take its course and we don't know where we'll end up... Which I guess is true, but I am not about to ruin this incredible dynamic friendship on account of 14 years repressed feelings I didn't even know I was repressing. Right?
Yeah that makes sense. Do you see yourself living without him?
Hahahaha

Hmmmm okay. Ultimately, it's up to you. If it were me, I would be the same way. On the one hand, I would want to confess everything and see what happens. On the other hand, I would want to keep things the way they are because of what you said

I guess it's a good thing I had this revelation now, when I don't have to see him for four months. By that time I should have pulled it together and we'll all just look back on this and laugh at how crazy I was.
It's a good kind of crazy though. And you seem to be handling it well now, which is good. You're just as sane as I am
Lol. And how is your sanity faring these days, my love?
It's hanging in there
You'll get the hang of it!
Haha thanks and yeah she's funny. The life of a young teen, the life of a Belieber... That should be the title to her autobiography
Hahahaha it amazes me that there are still beliebers out there
I know! She sings along too. Loudly hahahahaha
